description:
When an unsettling discovery is made regarding Kurogiri, Aizawa and Present Mic are summoned to interrogate him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare yori mo Omae wa Hero ni
Du bist mehr Held als jeder andere
More of a Hero Than Anyone
Tu voulais tellement être un héros
誰よりもおまえはヒーローに
